tool.name: Tophat Fusion Post

param.name: accepted_hits
param.label: BAM file of aligned RNA-Seq reads

param.name: num_fusion_reads
param.label: Num Fusion Reads
param.help: Fusions with at least this many supporting reads will be reported.

param.name: num_fusion_pairs
param.label: Num Fusion Pairs
param.help: Fusions with at least this many supporting pairs will be reported.

param.name: num_fusion_both
param.label: Num Fusion Reads + Pairs
param.help: The sum of supporting reads and pairs is at least this number for a fusion to be reported.

param.name: fusion_read_mismatches
param.label: Fusion Read Mismatches
param.help: Reads support fusions if they map across fusion with at most this many mismatches.

param.name: fusion_multireads
param.label: Reads that map to more than this many places will be ignored.
